SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM.synopsis: Shadowheart and the player go skinnydipping at a quiet cove near Baldur's Gate sometime after SH becomes an enemy of Shar. In this scene, Shadowheart is feeling vulnerable after having been abandoned by her goddess, and seeks a moment of catharsis with the player - she had previously shared with them that she didn't know how to swim, and now wishes to reclaim a bit of herself after her identity as a shar follower is lost.She and the player bond and a playful, tender romance scene ensues after the return to shore.Marking for rerecord for a more playful, teasing tone, less serious than the origial recordings.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM.how_to_trigger: 1. Open origin debug book2. Select Nights3. Select "Act 3 Romance - Enemy of Shar Path"4. Talk to Shadowheart5. Agree to go with her

Nightfall_SD_ROM.synopsis: On a Moonless night, the faithful of Shar can show worship by committing an act of depravity in Shar’s name. Shadowheart and the Avatar will engage in some sexual deviancy in order to fulfil this order.
Nightfall_SD_ROM.how_to_trigger: 1. Open origin debug book2. Select Nights3. Select "Act 3 Romance - Shar Path"4. Talk to Shadowheart5. Agree to go with her

Romance1_SD_Invitation.synopsis: Brief SD where Shadowheart asks if the player wants to come away to spend some 1:1 time together (a chance to trigger her act 1 romance scene away from the original party set-up).

ChosenOfShar_SD.synopsis: Avatar shadowheart reflects on the events of the shar temple and the death of Nightsong. Along with what that means for the future. Avatar can choose to change their hairstyle.
ChosenOfShar_SD.how_to_trigger: 1. Kill Nightsong with Shadowheart2. Long rest

DreamReflection_SD.synopsis: Shadowheart reflects on Shar and her own purpose while thinking back about the past.
DreamReflection_SD.how_to_trigger: 1. Start as Shadowheart Avatar2. Go to SCL3. Experience the Curse4. Go to camp

DaughterTears_SD.synopsis: Shadowheart is found crying for the first time in decades, reflecting on events in the Grotto. If her parents are still alive, they will come to comfort her.
DaughterTears_SD.how_to_trigger: 1. Open origin debug book2. Night conditions3. Night - Daughter's Tears

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_17.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_17.text: This will do. Take off your clothes.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart and the player have reached a small quiet cove not far from Baldur's Gate, SH looks around approvingly.NodeContext: Trying to be airy, casual

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_90.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_90.text: You don't want to get them wet, do you? Or worse, weigh you down. Go on; don't turn shy on me now.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_0.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_0.text: I never said I was coming in with you.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_32.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_32.text: Well you can't be of much help to me from the shoreline, can you? Shouting moral support while I drown?

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_65.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_65.text: I didn't bring anything to swim in.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_63.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_63.text: Come on then. We've already come this far.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_63.context: NodeContext: Sliver of nervousness. Encouraging herself as much as the player

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_77.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_77.text: Fine. Well don't just stand there, turn around.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_77.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their back to SH as she begins to undress off-screenNodeContext: Playfuly pleading modesty

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_16.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_16.text: You haven't even attempted to peek. I'm a little offended.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera holds on player. SH (offscreen) calls to the player while their back is still turnedNodeContext: Light/Joke-offended

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_93.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_93.text: What can I say? I'm respectful.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_49.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_49.text: That's one word for it, I suppose. You can turn around again.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_51.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps foward, nude. Off the player's look, she appears slightly apprehensive as she speaks.NodeContext: A little vulnerable (nude in front of the player for the first time)

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_10.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_10.text: Don't just stare while you're still dressed, I mean. Come on, I kept up my end of the bargain - will you keep up yours?
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sassy smile to conceal vulnerabilityNodeContext: Weaponized sass & inuendo to shield vulnerability

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_31.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH gives a cheeky smile. The player shrugs and reaches to take their clothing off.  Camera holds on Shadowheart, watching. Maybe her eyes widen a little. Brief fade down.NodeContext: Playful/cheeky. Watching the player undress

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH gives a cheeky smile. The player shrugs and reaches to take their clothing off.  Camera holds on Shadowheart, watching. Maybe her eyes widen a little. Brief fade down.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_82.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_82.text: Actually, I've changed my mind. I'm heading back to camp.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_104.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_104.text: You're what...? But I already took my clothes off.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_29.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_29.text: Now come on, get those clothes off. You've made me wait long enough.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player starts to disrobe. Camera holds on Shadowheart, watching. Maybe her eyes widen a little. Brief fade downNodeContext: Eager

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_75.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Shadowheart both stand at the shoreline, undressed and facing the water. Shadowheart turns. Time cut to the player and Shadowheart both standing at the shoreline, undressed and facing the water. Shadowheart turns to the player.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_21.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_21.text: I... I don't know if I can do this. Now that I'm here.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Use scene cameras to account for different Scene Stage possibilities, the player could be in the water already on the Streaming Safe version of the scene.NodeContext: Sudden bout of cold feet. Looking for reassurance

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_88.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_88.text: Yes you can. Just walk forward until you feel the weight lift.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_57.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_57.context: CinematicNodeContext: After her line, Shadowheart walks forward out of frame. The player follows.NodeContext: Deep breath, building her nerve

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_27.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_27.text: All the things we've faced, and you're afraid of getting a little wet?

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_69.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_69.text: More the drowning, and the things that could be hiding underwater, and the drowning, and the cold. Did I mention the drowning?

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_36.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_36.text: Let's get on with it, before I lose my nerve.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: After her line, Shadowheart walks forward out of frame. The player follows.NodeContext: Deep breath, building her nerve

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_66.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_66.text: We don't have to do this if you're not ready.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_92.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_92.text: Wait - just give me a moment. I can manage. As long as you stay with me.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Deep breath to steel her nerves after 'wait'. After her line, Shadowheart walks forward out of frame. The player follows.NodeContext: Deep breath to steel her nerves after 'wait'.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_61.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_61.text: Shrug and run in ahead of her.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_30.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_30.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player dashes out of frame towards the water. After a brief hesitation, she follows.

Choice shouldn't be available if player chose DO AS SHE SAYS in Streaming Safe branchNodeContext: Surprised. The player has rushed into water to go skinnydipping, leaving her to follow

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_95.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_95.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Shadowheart tread water near one another, NodeContext: Shocked by cold water

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_6.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: she delivers her line, wry look on her face then splashs the player and moves toward them as the camera tilts to the moon overhead.NodeContext: playful, Breathless from cold water

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_5.text: Thank you. I needed that. I needed to know I can face things without Shar.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Later, the player and Shadowheart are sitting side by side at the shore post-swim. Still undressed (if Streaming Safe isn't engaged).NodeContext: Grateful, sincere. Going swimming has proven to be cathartic

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_59.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_59.text: I don't want to go back. Not just yet.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH leans in closer to the player, looking at them intently.NodeContext: Longing, romantic

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_9.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_9.text: I'd drag you into the sand if I thought I'd survive it. Then again, I suppose I can think of worse ways to die.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Both still sitting on the beach. Player is to Shadowheart's right. Shadowheart is on her right side leaning back on her right arm

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_79.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_79.text: How about a night on the beach, under the stars? Together. Just near enough.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Both still sitting on beach.The camera leaves them be, panning away to the shore. But no touch between them two.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_84.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_84.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She kisses the player softly, then hungrily.

She lowers herself to the sand, the player following. They embrace, the player on top of Shadowheart. She suddenly utters a small gasp of pain - 

SH squirms slightly to move off an offscreen pebble poking into her.NodeContext: Include small gasp of pain

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_3.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She kisses the player softly, then hungrily.

SH squirms slightly to move off an offscreen pebble poking into her.NodeContext: Include small gasp of pain

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_48.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_48.context: CinematicNodeContext: She pulls the player in closer. They kiss.NodeContext: Passionate

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_18.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: She pulls the player in closer. They kiss.NodeContext: Passionate

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_112.context: CinematicNodeContext: The camera leaves them be, panning away to the shore. Design shot to work for both Explicit and Streaming Safe Modes.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_113.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She kisses the player softly, then hungrily.

She lowers herself to the sand, the player following. They embrace, the player on top of Shadowheart. She suddenly utters a small gasp of pain - 

SH squirms slightly to move off an offscreen pebble poking into her.NodeContext: Include small gasp of pain

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_114.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_114.text: And you can put them back on again if you like. Come on, we've a walk ahead of us.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_37.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_37.text: Yes. A silent one, if you have any sense.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_55.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_55.text: You're lucky I didn't have anything more dangerous to throw than undergarments.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns to peek, only to duck a balled item of clothing flung at them.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_13.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_13.text: Fine. Well don't just stand there, turn around.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their back to SH as she begins to undress off-screenNodeContext: Playfuly pleading modesty

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_41.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_41.text: You haven't even attempted to peek. I'm a little offended.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera holds on player. SH (offscreen) calls to the player while their back is still turnedNodeContext: Light/Joke-offended

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_25.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_25.context: NodeContext: pleased with herself. Got undressed while the player was facing away/undressing themselves

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_76.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_76.context: NodeContext: A little vulnerable (nude in front of the player for the first time)

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_99.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_99.text: I know. But it's nice to hear you say it.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_99.context: NodeContext: Masking relief with a airy confidence

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_38.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_38.text: We'd better get warmed up then. Come on.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_105.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns away from Shadowheart and reaches to undress. The screen fades to black for a brief time passage-of-time cut. It comes back to playe nude, having left their clothing on the sand. They turn back to Shadowheart - who steps forward, already nude.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_80.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_80.text: There's easier ways to get me naked, you know.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_62.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_62.text: I don't doubt you in the slightest.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Coy smileNodeContext: Gently teasing

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_20.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_20.text: This will do. Get in the water.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart and the player have reached a small quiet cove not far from Baldur's Gate, SH looks around approvingly.NodeContext: Trying to be airy, casual

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_46.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_46.text: Go on, you're not afraid of getting a little wet, are you?

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_70.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_70.text: I never said I was coming in with you.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart shrugs in a 'have it your way' gesture, then moves to undress. The player smiles, then follows suit - no nudity shown. Cut to them inside the water, obscuring their bodies.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart shrugs in a 'have it your way' gesture, then moves to undress. The player smiles, then follows suit - no nudity shown. Cut to them inside the water, obscuring their bodies.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player moves to undress. Shadowheart smiles, then follows suit - no nudity shown. Cut to them inside the water, obscuring their bodies.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_23.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_23.text: My feet aren't touching the bottom anymore - it's terrifying. Do people really enjoy this?
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_23.context: CinematicNodeContext: shadowheart and player are paddling in water, hiding their nudity beneath the water, face to faceNodeContext: Mild alarm as she learns to swim

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_43.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_43.text: You can hold onto me if you're afraid.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_56.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_56.text: You know you didn't need to wait until I was in the water to hold me.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_89.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_89.context: CinematicNodeContext: she delivers her line, wry look on her face then splashs the player and moves toward them as the camera tilts to the moon overhead.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_71.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_71.text: Thank you. I needed that. I needed to know I can face things without Shar.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Later, the player and Shadowheart are sitting side by side at the shore post-swim. Dressed.NodeContext: Grateful, sincere. Going swimming has proven to be cathartic

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_102.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_102.text: I don't want to go back. Not just yet.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_102.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH leans in closer to the player, looking at them intently.NodeContext: Longing, romantic

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_12.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: She pulls the player in closer. They kiss.NodeContext: passionate

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_40.context: CinematicNodeContext: The camera leaves them be, panning away to the shore. Design shot to work for both Explicit and Streaming Safe Modes.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: She pulls the player in closer. They kiss.NodeContext: passionate

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_91.context: CinematicNodeContext: The camera leaves them be, panning away to the shore. Design shot to work for both Explicit and Streaming Safe Modes.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_78.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_78.text: All the things we've faced, and you're afraid of getting a little wet?

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_64.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_64.text: More the drowning, and the things that could be hiding underwater, and the drowning, and the cold. Did I mention the drowning?

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_53.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_53.text: We can go back to shore if you're uncomfortable.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_74.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_74.text: Wait - just give me a moment. I can manage. As long as you stay with me.
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: treading water, takes a deep breath to steel herselfNodeContext: Building her nerve

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_106.speaker: Shadowheart
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_106.context: CinematicNodeContext: being splashed softly by player, feigns outrageNodeContext: Mock outrage

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player moves to undress. Shadowheart smiles, then follows suit - no nudity shown. Cut to them inside the water, obscuring their bodies.

SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_100.speaker: Player
SkinnyDipping_SD_ROM_100.text: I didn't bring anything to swim in.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_31.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_31.text: This is the spot. Looks like someone's left poor Selûne untended...
Nightfall_SD_ROM_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Shadowheart a tiny, neglected shrine of Selûne - little more than a statue of the moonmaiden in a quiet, overgrown city courtyard. Shadowheart produces a little bottle/vial full of dark red liquid.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_45.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_45.text: Something of a much rarer vintage. After I offered up the Nightsong to Lady Shar, her blood was on the spear, on my hands, on my clothing. I wrung out every drop I could. Saved it for a special occasion.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_35.speaker: Player
Nightfall_SD_ROM_35.text: This act of wickedness - it isn't going to hurt anyone, is it?

Nightfall_SD_ROM_6.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_6.text: Physically? No... that part is already done. This will wound the spirit. Most deeply, I should hope.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_36.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_36.text: After I offered up the Nightsong to Lady Shar, her blood was on the spear, on my hands, on my clothing. I wrung out every drop I could. Saved it for a special occasion.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_2.text: Let's see what comfort we can offer a grieving mother.
Nightfall_SD_ROM_2.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart unstops the vial of Nightsong's blood and moves towards the statue of Selûne. The player follows. 

OTS from behind the alter looking up at Shadowheart as she pours the blood across it.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_39.context: CinematicNodeContext: As Shadowheart steps back to admire her work, the player steps forward, smearing the blood around as though finger painting.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_48.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_48.text: You did well. I hope you're not trying to surpass me in Lady Shar's graces.
Nightfall_SD_ROM_48.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The statue of Selûne has been desecrated with the blood of her daughter. Red tears trail from the eyes. Assorted graffiti is dotted all over.

The player looks down from the the statue to their bloodied hand.

Shadowheart appears at the player's side. She's bright-eyed and blood-smeared.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_28.speaker: Player
Nightfall_SD_ROM_28.text: Not at all. So now we feast?

Nightfall_SD_ROM_0.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_0.text: Yes. But I'm afraid I forgot to bring any food...
Nightfall_SD_ROM_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

Nightfall_SD_ROM_5.speaker: Player
Nightfall_SD_ROM_5.text: I thought you had no time for lovers anymore - what does this mean for us?

Nightfall_SD_ROM_17.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_17.text: It means nothing. Shar owns my heart. But luckily she's willing to share the rest of me, just this once.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_19.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_19.text: That's what makes it so good.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_11.speaker: Player
Nightfall_SD_ROM_11.text: Gods, what I wouldn't give to kiss you right now.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_43.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_43.text: But whatever you have to give... it's not enough, is it?
Nightfall_SD_ROM_43.context: NodeContext: Disappointed, Realising Karlach can't kiss her.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_47.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_47.text: A shame. I wanted to show you just how rewarding the embrace of darkness could be... but perhaps it is not meant for you. Good night.
Nightfall_SD_ROM_47.context: NodeContext: Disappointed, Realising Karlach can't kiss her.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Taller players step forward, guiding Shadowheart into a kill by the shoulders.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_41.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps back from the kiss, delivers her line, then pushes the player to the ground, she kneels, straddling the player. She kisses forcefully.NodeContext: Spoken mid-kiss

Nightfall_SD_ROM_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shorter race players take Shadowheart by the hand, guiding her into a kiss.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_16.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls back from the kneeling kiss, delivers her line, then places a hand on the player's chest, shifting her weight and forcing the player to the ground. She strattles them and kisses, forcefully.NodeContext: Spoken mid-kiss

Nightfall_SD_ROM_13.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The kiss ends, the players face a mix of shock and anticipation. The player's hand comes up subcontiously touching their lip, it's bleeding.

Shadowheart smirks.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cut to the desecrated idol, and exit the scene.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_18.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart leans back, Shadowheart crosses her arms, reaching down to her belt line to pull her tunic up.

The player looks up as Shadowheart pantomimes undressing offscreen.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_15.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_15.text: First the act of wickedness, then the feast... but I think this will count as both at once.
Nightfall_SD_ROM_15.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart topless and still strattling the player, puts her hand on the player's chest, delivers the first half her line, then rolls to a strattling position on top of her--then delivers the second half of her line.

The player reaches down to their own belt line to remove their tunic.

Cut to Shadowheart as she watches the player undress.

Shadowheart pulls the player's head down to her own.NodeContext: Slightly breathless, barely contained.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_42.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Further explicit content can be added before this node.

The statue of Selûne looms over them, covered in the blood of Nightsong...

Nightfall_SD_ROM_32.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The kiss ends, the players face a mix of shock and anticipation. The player's hand comes up subcontiously touching their lip, it's bleeding.

Shadowheart smirks.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_12.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_12.text: Go, then. Maybe you can do better by yourself, though I doubt it.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_33.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

Nightfall_SD_ROM_3.speaker: Player
Nightfall_SD_ROM_3.text: Of course. I'm clearly better at wickedness than you are.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

Nightfall_SD_ROM_7.speaker: Player
Nightfall_SD_ROM_7.text: A little healthy competition. Nothing to fear.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_25.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_25.text: I'm not afraid. Far from it.
Nightfall_SD_ROM_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

Nightfall_SD_ROM_44.speaker: Player
Nightfall_SD_ROM_44.text: Selûne will forgive me. I did what I had to, for the sake of our partnership.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_30.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_30.text: Indeed? And what else might you be willing to do...?
Nightfall_SD_ROM_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

Nightfall_SD_ROM_27.speaker: Player
Nightfall_SD_ROM_27.text: So what shall we be doing? Theft? Arson? Murder? Foul language?

Nightfall_SD_ROM_21.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_21.text: Fine suggestions, all. Perhaps another time.

Nightfall_SD_ROM_20.speaker: Shadowheart
Nightfall_SD_ROM_20.text: Go, then. Lady Shar's blessings can be for me alone.

Romance1_SD_Invitation_1.speaker: Shadowheart
Romance1_SD_Invitation_1.text: It seems to be the perfect night to spend a little time together, just you and I... assuming you haven't changed your mind, of course?
Romance1_SD_Invitation_1.context: NodeContext: Anticipation/tiny bit nervous. Made plans for some 1:1 time (a repeat of the act one romance/wine scene)

Romance1_SD_Invitation_2.speaker: Player
Romance1_SD_Invitation_2.text: I'm sorry, but I don't think we should do this.

Romance1_SD_Invitation_0.speaker: Shadowheart
Romance1_SD_Invitation_0.text: Oh. A pity - I've been missing out on beauty sleep, just to wait up on you. Good night.
Romance1_SD_Invitation_0.context: NodeContext: Disappointed/miffed. Player backed out of a change for a romantic encounter.

ChosenOfShar_SD_21.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_21.text: *Fatigue creeps through your limbs, and presses on your mind. Yet it is a pleasurable sort of weariness - one founded in accomplishment.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_24.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_24.text: *You slew the Nightsong. You caused the Selûnite enclave at Last Light to fall. All for the Dark Lady. Now you are her Chosen.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_23.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_23.text: *You slew the daughter of Selûne for the Dark Lady. Now you are her Chosen.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_17.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_17.text: *Your glory, bought with the blood of others. It was worth it, was it not...?*

ChosenOfShar_SD_15.speaker: Shadowheart
ChosenOfShar_SD_15.text: Of course it was worth it. Your whole life has been leading to this.

ChosenOfShar_SD_7.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_7.text: *Lady Shar's favour is worth everything. You would have gladly done what she asked a thousand times over.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_0.speaker: Shadowheart
ChosenOfShar_SD_0.text: Banish such doubts - they only distract from your faith.

ChosenOfShar_SD_3.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_3.text: *Yet what of your lover? Would Lady Shar approve of that distraction? Perhaps you can earn the right to share your heart, if you excel in all other areas of service.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_9.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_9.text: *Your dedication has already brought you far already. Who is to say what greatness awaits?*

ChosenOfShar_SD_4.speaker: Shadowheart
ChosenOfShar_SD_4.text: You cannot lie. Part of you regrets the cost in life. Yet it was Lady Shar's will.

ChosenOfShar_SD_1.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_1.text: *A small sacrifice, compared to the infinite glories that await.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_20.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_20.text: *You are destined to be at Lady Shar's right hand, while others lose her favour.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_10.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_10.text: *Like your Mother Superior. She marked the wound on your hand. She sent you on a mission that nearly cost you everything.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_2.speaker: Shadowheart
ChosenOfShar_SD_2.text: She must be purged. The Dark Lady demands it.

ChosenOfShar_SD_11.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_11.text: *She will become a footnote, once you take her place. Your glory will be unparalleled.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_22.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_22.text: *Yet you still feel like a novice, at times. To be the Chosen of Shar demands certain... gravitas.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_12.speaker: Shadowheart
ChosenOfShar_SD_12.text: You still wear your hair like a trainee. Time for something more... commanding.

ChosenOfShar_SD_18.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_18.text: *So be it. There will be no rest for you yet, but come dawn, you will even closer to Lady Shar, in image and spirit.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_16.speaker: Shadowheart
ChosenOfShar_SD_16.text: That will come in time - your actions will speak for themselves. Now, rest.

ChosenOfShar_SD_14.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_14.text: *The oblivion of sleep awaits. You hasten towards it.*

ChosenOfShar_SD_8.speaker: Shadowheart
ChosenOfShar_SD_8.text: The Mother Superior always hindered your ambitions. Yet now you will unseat her. Ironic.

ChosenOfShar_SD_5.speaker: Shadowheart
ChosenOfShar_SD_5.text: She saved your life, and made you who you are today. You owe her much.

ChosenOfShar_SD_19.speaker: Narrator
ChosenOfShar_SD_19.text: *No matter. Anything owed belongs to the Nightsinger, ultimately. The loss of your mentor will herald your own triumph.*

DreamReflection_SD_18.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_18.text: *Rest eludes you. All you can think of is this strange new place, where  even the stars themselves have been smothered by Lady Shar's embrace.*

DreamReflection_SD_13.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_13.text: *What does the Dark Lady want of you? At times, it feels like you are without guidance, while other times, she shields you. You feel lost - a sensation that is not new to you...*

DreamReflection_SD_27.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_27.text: *Rest eludes you. All you can think of is this strange new place, where  even the stars themselves have been smothered by Lady Shar's embrace.*

DreamReflection_SD_2.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_2.text: *What does the Dark Lady want of you? At times, it feels like she is punishing you, while other times, she shields you. You feel lost - a sensation that is not new to you...*
DreamReflection_SD_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: On 'it feels like she is punishing you' Shadowheart looks at her right hand, where she usually feels the incurable wound. Lowers it afterward

DreamReflection_SD_37.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_37.text: *In fact, one of the few memories you can still lay claim to is of being lost. Lost and afraid...*

DreamReflection_SD_5.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_5.text: *That memory of the woods, nearly dying, being saved... it's all you have of your childhood. Lady Shar guards the rest.*
DreamReflection_SD_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's eyes blink open after having briefly slipped off to sleep

DreamReflection_SD_14.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_14.text: *You feel the pain swell in your right hand. Invisible agony that rises from nowhere.*
DreamReflection_SD_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart raises her right hand and looks at it, wincing in pain.

DreamReflection_SD_23.speaker: Shadowheart
DreamReflection_SD_23.text: Focus. What could be the cause of this?

DreamReflection_SD_10.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_10.text: *It is impossible to think straight. Only the pain fills your head, until it starts to ebb away...*
DreamReflection_SD_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH winces in pain, then her expression eases as the pain fades.

DreamReflection_SD_4.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_4.text: *Useless. The pain floods your nerves no matter what. You clench your jaw until it eases.*
DreamReflection_SD_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH winces in pain, then her expression eases as the pain fades.

DreamReflection_SD_32.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_32.text: *As you lose yourself in the fragments of a past you barely recognise, you feel a dull ache spread from your right hand.*

DreamReflection_SD_11.speaker: Shadowheart
DreamReflection_SD_11.text: The pain guides. It teaches. Only when you stray from the Nightsinger's path, does it bite.

DreamReflection_SD_8.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_8.text: *Lady Shar aids you in the dark, and punishes you when you stray. She is guiding you towards something.*

DreamReflection_SD_35.speaker: Shadowheart
DreamReflection_SD_35.text: This land is under the Lady Shar's sway. Maybe answers lie where her power is strongest.

DreamReflection_SD_41.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_41.text: *Perhaps this is a test. Mother Superior would have you make for Baldur's Gate without delay... but the call of the Dark Shar cannot go ignored.*

DreamReflection_SD_30.speaker: Shadowheart
DreamReflection_SD_30.text: There were Dark Justiciars here once - you saw the signs. You should heed them - learn more.

DreamReflection_SD_28.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_28.text: *Whatever awaits you in these lands is important, and must be found. The Dark Lady wills it... in her own way.*

DreamReflection_SD_34.speaker: Shadowheart
DreamReflection_SD_34.text: There were Dark Justiciars here once - you saw the signs. There must be a temple - somewhere dedicated to Lady Shar.

DreamReflection_SD_9.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_9.text: *This cannot be a coincidence. Dare you dream of joining the ranks of her elite...?

DreamReflection_SD_39.speaker: Shadowheart
DreamReflection_SD_39.text: Concentrate on your mission. The Mother Superior awaits your return to Baldur's Gate.

DreamReflection_SD_15.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_15.text: *And yet... Lady Shar herself seems to guide you elsewhere. Surely you cannot resist her influence. Perhaps Baldur's Gate can come later...*

DreamReflection_SD_40.speaker: Shadowheart
DreamReflection_SD_40.text: Why were you alone in those woods? The gaps in your memories are vast, unnerving...

DreamReflection_SD_17.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_17.text: *The possibilities are countless. You could have been lost, abandoned, orphaned, or even offered as a sacrifice to the gods.*

DreamReflection_SD_22.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_22.text: *Some druids force children to live off the land. Selûnites leave their young in the wilds and challenge them to find their way home. Followers of Talos are said to sacrifice innocents to lightning.*

DreamReflection_SD_24.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_24.text: *But it was Lady Shar who embraced you, whatever your past. You serve her, and now she guides you towards something.*

DreamReflection_SD_31.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_31.text: *Such feelings serve no purpose - you must cast them aside. Lady Shar will reveal all, in time. Even now, you sense she is guiding you towards something.*

DreamReflection_SD_1.speaker: Shadowheart
DreamReflection_SD_1.text: The pain must be a test. To embrace Lady Shar completely is to leave all pain and sorrow behind.

DreamReflection_SD_20.speaker: Narrator
DreamReflection_SD_20.text: *This cannot be a coincidence. She must have a plan for you.*

DaughterTears_SD_23.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_23.text: It doesn't look like anyone's been here in a while. Perhaps people lost faith. Or... forgot about it.
DaughterTears_SD_23.context:
CinematicNodeContext: SHADOWHEART stands in a quiet, overgrown city courtyard. In one corner is a statue of Selûne. She looks at it, wide-eyed.

The PLAYER approaches. Shadowheart nods towards the statue.

DaughterTears_SD_39.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_39.text: I wanted to come here. To see if I felt anything that I hadn't done before. Now that I know what I know. Now that I know who I am.
DaughterTears_SD_39.context: CinematicNodeContext: She looks at the player directly.

DaughterTears_SD_42.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_42.text: I... I don't know. For so long I only felt what she wanted me to. Now I have to do it for myself, and I feel like I'm drowning.

DaughterTears_SD_38.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_38.text: Good thing I taught you how to swim, then.

DaughterTears_SD_126.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_126.text: A very good thing. I don't know what I did to trick you into thinking I was worthy of you, but I'm glad it worked.

DaughterTears_SD_15.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_15.text: You're putting too much pressure on yourself. Give it time.

DaughterTears_SD_105.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_105.text: Shame. More than I ever knew it was possible to feel. Shar left me with all the memories I need to punish myself.

DaughterTears_SD_29.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_29.text: I have my family back, and now I can't even look them in the eye. I don't deserve to be anyone's daughter.

DaughterTears_SD_97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart looks up to see her PARENTS approaching. ARNELL gives the player a Dad nod as he passes.

DaughterTears_SD_111.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_111.text: I'm sorry. You shouldn't have to see me like this.

DaughterTears_SD_44.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_44.text: Alive? Free? Feeling? I've dreamt for years of seeing you like this.
DaughterTears_SD_44.context: CinematicNodeContext: [scene] Both parents approach Shadowheart. Emmeline cups Shadowheart's cheek, brushing a tear away.

DaughterTears_SD_117.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_117.text: Seeing you as yourself again, Jen. It kept us going, all this time.
DaughterTears_SD_117.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart breathes, the tears subsiding.

DaughterTears_SD_37.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_37.text: I can't be your Jenevelle. Not as you remember her.
DaughterTears_SD_37.context: NodeContext: Steadying herself. Having a quiet epiphany.

DaughterTears_SD_58.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_58.text: No. I'd be turning my back on too much. Shadowheart is as much a part of who I am as Jenevelle; I can't just forget her - that's not what I do anymore.
DaughterTears_SD_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Arnell and Emmeline exchange a sceptical look with one another towards the end of Shadowheart's line.

DaughterTears_SD_75.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_75.text: Besides, Shadowheart still suits me - even better than before, perhaps. You can't cast a shadow without some light.

DaughterTears_SD_94.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_94.text: Don't worry. I'm still your daughter... if you want me to be.

DaughterTears_SD_131.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_131.text: I'll call you whatever you like, so long as you're happy. Arnell?

DaughterTears_SD_13.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_13.text: The Moonmaiden guides, and helps us find our true selves, Shadowheart. Daughter.
DaughterTears_SD_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Arnell smiles and puts a hand on Shadowheart's shoulder. The player watches, pleased, then slips away, letting the reunited family enjoy their moment.

DaughterTears_SD_93.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_93.text: Loss. Actual loss, not Shar's oblivion. I had my family, for too short a moment. Now they're gone. By my hand.

DaughterTears_SD_46.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_46.text: They're not truly gone - remember the moon motes.

DaughterTears_SD_88.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_88.text: I remember. But they can't comfort me. They can't give me advice. They can't tell me what I was like as a little girl.
DaughterTears_SD_88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Verge of tearsNodeContext: Verge of tears

DaughterTears_SD_34.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_34.text: You did what was necessary. You freed them, and yourself.

DaughterTears_SD_20.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_20.text: But why does freedom have to feel like I've lost everything? Perhaps I could have saved them, or perhaps Shar would have helped me forget them. Instead, I've neither...
DaughterTears_SD_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Verge of tearsNodeContext: Verge of tears

DaughterTears_SD_31.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_31.text: You made your choice - now you have to live with it.

DaughterTears_SD_2.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_2.text: Perhaps not for long. The Absolute may yet put us out of our misery. I may see my parents again sooner than you think...
DaughterTears_SD_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Verge of tearsNodeContext: Verge of tears

DaughterTears_SD_82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart breaks down into gentle weeping.

DaughterTears_SD_26.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_26.text: That's it, let it all out. This has been a long time coming.

DaughterTears_SD_19.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_19.text: It's been a long time since I shed a tear. I don't even know how long.
DaughterTears_SD_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart continues to cry another moment, then gathers herself.NodeContext: Gathering herself after crying

DaughterTears_SD_5.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_5.text: We carry on - it's all we can do. I'll follow in a while, but I think I want to stay here a little longer, firstly. This place isn't familiar, but it's peaceful.

DaughterTears_SD_41.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_41.text: So it's still Shadowheart, then? Sounds like you're not keen on Jenevelle.

DaughterTears_SD_101.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_101.text: Shadowheart. She's as much a part of who I am as Jenevelle; I can't just forget her - that's not what I do anymore.

DaughterTears_SD_81.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_81.text: Besides, Shadowheart still suits me - even better than before, perhaps. You can't cast a shadow without some light.
DaughterTears_SD_81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Small smileNodeContext: Spoken with a small smile. Reconciling the two parts of herself

DaughterTears_SD_107.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_107.text: So what is it now - Shadowheart or Jenevelle?

DaughterTears_SD_102.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_102.text: You've punished yourself enough. Let's head back.

DaughterTears_SD_106.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_106.text: I'll follow. But I think I want to stay here a little longer, firstly. This place isn't familiar, but it's peaceful.

DaughterTears_SD_6.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_6.text: Dry your eyes. Until we've saved ourselves, tears are a luxury.

DaughterTears_SD_80.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_80.text: All about the mission. You sound like how I used to sound. I'm all right now. Or... close enough, anyway.
DaughterTears_SD_80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart continues to cry another moment, then gathers herself.NodeContext: Gathering herself after crying

DaughterTears_SD_55.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_55.text: I'm all right now. Or... close enough, anyway.
DaughterTears_SD_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart continues to cry another moment, then gathers herself.NodeContext: Gathering herself after crying

DaughterTears_SD_87.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_87.text: You've turned from Shar. Doesn't necessarily oblige you to come here and embrace Selûne.

DaughterTears_SD_70.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_70.text: True. But too much freedom can be frightening... lonely. There's a reason why so many are eager to bow.

DaughterTears_SD_104.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_104.text: I had my family, for too short a moment. Now they're gone. By my hand.

DaughterTears_SD_43.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_43.text: Who you are? You mean Jenevelle?

DaughterTears_SD_10.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_10.text: That's a dead girl's name. I don't deserve it - I had to look up how it was spelled, for pity's sake.

DaughterTears_SD_120.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_120.text: The Moonmaiden guides, but discreetly. Give it time.

DaughterTears_SD_67.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_67.text: So much time's been lost already. Most of it, I can't even remember. And what I do remember... it would have been so much easier to just become a monster.

DaughterTears_SD_69.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_69.text: As a traitor to your goddess, you should feel shame - shame and dread.

DaughterTears_SD_99.speaker: Shadowheart
DaughterTears_SD_99.text: You helped bring me to this point - you're as much a traitor as anyone. Besides, the betrayal was Shar's, not mine.

DaughterTears_SD_30.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_30.text: *You stare up at the statue of Selûne. Her placid stone face was once that of the enemy, but no longer...*
DaughterTears_SD_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Avatar SH gazes at the statue of Selune contemplatively.

DaughterTears_SD_68.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_68.text: *Now you see a benevolent stranger. An unasked-for patron. And a guiding light for your parents.*
DaughterTears_SD_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Avatar SH gazes at the statue of Selune contemplatively.

DaughterTears_SD_33.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_33.text: *They're with her now. Thanks to you.*
DaughterTears_SD_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH bows her head solemnly.

DaughterTears_SD_57.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_57.text: *While you are left behind, once again. You feel a lump rise in your throat.*

DaughterTears_SD_3.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_3.text: Try to dampen emotion with reason. You barely knew them.

DaughterTears_SD_51.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_51.text: *You cannot swallow your own lie. You knew them, and you miss them. Your vision blurs with hot tears...*

DaughterTears_SD_98.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_98.text: Silently rebuke yourself. Weeping is what others do.

DaughterTears_SD_24.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_24.text: *The old you may have believed that once, but no more. Your vision blurs with hot tears...*

DaughterTears_SD_48.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_48.text: Offer a prayer for them - to Selûne.

DaughterTears_SD_12.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_12.text: *You silently fumble for the right words. No doubt your parents could have guided you in what to say. Tears blur your eyes...*

DaughterTears_SD_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart breaks down into gentle weeping. After a few moments, she gathers herself, brushing her cheek with the back of her hand.

DaughterTears_SD_22.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_22.text: *You realise you cannot remember when you last shed tears. Could it be possible that you never cried before?*
DaughterTears_SD_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Composed again, gazing at the statue.

DaughterTears_SD_17.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_17.text: *All you know is you feel better for it - lighter. You know where you came from. You know you were loved. And where you go now is in your hands.*
DaughterTears_SD_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Composed, gazing at the statue.

DaughterTears_SD_123.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_123.text: Tears are coming. Let them flow.

DaughterTears_SD_86.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_86.text: *You succeeded, but at what cost? Your pain endures. Your past is lost - save for the very worst memories. How can your parents bear to even look at you, never mind love you?*

DaughterTears_SD_56.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_56.text: *Parents. You rejected Shar for these strangers you share blood with, but you also did terrible things to them. And yet, they profess to love you all the same.*

DaughterTears_SD_7.speaker: Narrator
DaughterTears_SD_7.text: *Shame, joy, regret, relief, and a host of other emotions jostle for your attention. It's too much. You feel hot tears flood your eyes.*

DaughterTears_SD_50.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Arnell speaks softly off-screen. SH looks up, face tear-streaked.

DaughterTears_SD_49.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_49.text: My darling girl. The last time I saw you cry, you cut your knee while chasing a frog.
DaughterTears_SD_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: [scene] Emmeline and Arnell approach Shadowheart. Emmeline gently brushes the tears from Shadowheart's cheek with her right hand.NodeContext: Soothing.

DaughterTears_SD_128.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_128.text: And we're not going anywhere, Jenevelle.

DaughterTears_SD_119.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_119.text: I don't deserve you. Not after all I did to you.

DaughterTears_SD_71.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_71.text: Banish those thoughts. You deserve a lifetime of happiness that was taken from you. Now we have to make up for lost time.
DaughterTears_SD_71.context: NodeContext: reassuring, but with a firm, motherly edge. 'no more silly talk'

DaughterTears_SD_66.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_66.text: Your mother's right, Jen. We're here for you.

DaughterTears_SD_91.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_91.text: Wait, Arnell. Don't you see? She's not a little girl anymore. That name stays with the child. Our daughter is a woman who's lived a whole lifetime away from us, and her name is Shadowheart.
DaughterTears_SD_91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Studying Shadowheart with a knowing, motherly look while addressing ArnellNodeContext: 'A mother knows' almost uncanny insight

DaughterTears_SD_35.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_35.text: Jenevelle... I can't be her. I'm sorry.

DaughterTears_SD_53.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_53.text: Wait, Arnell. Don't you see? Our daughter's not a little girl anymore. She's a woman - one who's lived a whole lifetime without us.
DaughterTears_SD_53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Studying Shadowheart with a knowing, motherly look while addressing ArnellNodeContext: 'A mother knows' almost uncanny insight

DaughterTears_SD_61.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_61.text: Of course we do. We're two halves of you. And we'll love you all the same, no matter what you're called. Arnell?
DaughterTears_SD_61.context: NodeContext: Understanding. Slight questioning tone on 'Arnell?' to ensure her husband is of a similar mind

DaughterTears_SD_95.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_95.text: Your mother's right - she always is. Do not bend to the past. Look only to the future - on your own terms.
DaughterTears_SD_95.context: NodeContext: Moment of realisation and acceptance. His daughter isn't exactly as he remembers her, and that's okay

DaughterTears_SD_90.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_90.text: Shadowheart. Our daughter. It suits you.

DaughterTears_SD_92.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_92.text: Of course. It speaks to both sides of you. After all, you cannot cast a shadow without some light.

DaughterTears_SD_122.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's eyes start to well up with tears again - but happy ones. She reaches for her parents in an embrace.

DaughterTears_SD_79.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_79.text: I've known some who'd argue with you on that...

DaughterTears_SD_108.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_108.text: You point them towards me - I'll sort their bacon in no time.

DaughterTears_SD_47.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_47.text: Hush dear, we've had enough excitement to last a good while...

DaughterTears_SD_14.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_14.text: But yes, Shadowheart. It speaks to both sides of you. After all, you cannot cast a shadow without some light.

DaughterTears_SD_18.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_18.text: It's what I'm used to, that's all.

DaughterTears_SD_115.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_115.text: It's more than that. It speaks to both sides of you. After all, you cannot cast a shadow without some light.

DaughterTears_SD_84.speaker: Player
DaughterTears_SD_84.text: Perhaps I can try. Perhaps I can get used to the name.

DaughterTears_SD_77.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_77.text: No. Your mother's right - she always is. Do not bend to the past. Look only to the future - on your own terms.
DaughterTears_SD_77.context: NodeContext: Moment of realisation and acceptance. His daughter isn't exactly as he remembers her, and that's okay

DaughterTears_SD_112.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
DaughterTears_SD_112.text: No, Jen. That's what they called you - forced on you.
DaughterTears_SD_112.context: NodeContext: Some alarm, like his daughter is experiencing Stockholm syndrome
